text: Vacqueyras is a commune of 1,260 people (2015). It is in the region Provence- Alpes-CÃ´te d'Azur in the Vaucluse department in the south of France. == Geography == Vacqueyras is on the southern edge of the Dentelles de Montmirail, about east of Orange and north of Carpentras.
